name: substring()
brief: Returns a new string that is a part of the original string
description: Returns a new string that is a part of the original string. When using the endIndex parameter, the string between beginIndex and endIndex-1 is returned.

parameters.name: str
parameters.description: String: any variable of type String

parameters.name: beginIndex
parameters.description: int: position from which to begin (inclusive)

parameters.name: endIndex
parameters.description: int: position from which to end (exclusive)
